Description: Completing story missions and challenges, including main story and event stories.
Earning chrono crystals through soul boosting characters. Players can earn crystals by completing various stages of soul boost.
Participating in events or missions related to the original Dragon Ball series characters.
Taking part in special events that offer chrono crystals as rewards, which are available for a limited duration.
Engaging in raid boss battles. Players can earn chrono crystals by defeating raid bosses and reaching certain milestones.
Playing cooperative multiplayer battles. Completing co-op missions can reward players with chrono crystals.
